title: Belkin Anti-Smudge Screen Protector for Apple iPod Touch 4th Generation (2 Pack)
description: Shield Against Smudges Resist fingerprints and other smudges on your screen with an overlay that prevents the build-up of dirt from daily use. Defend Your Device Avoid damage without affecting your touchscreen's functionality. Strong yet thin and lightweight, the overlay provides excellent protection that will help keep your device looking like new.Tru Clear See your screen, not the overlay. Tru Clear technology ensures optimal screen visibility. Fast Install Applying the overlay is fast and easy. Simply clean your phone screen with the included cleaning wipe, peel the overlay from its backing and place it onto your screen. Then use the included smoothing card to push away creases and bubbles.
